title: [BUG]  Drawing with CPU and GPU gives different results when using larger blur radius.
body:
**Description**

Drawing with CPU and GPU gives different results when using larger blur radius

**Expected Behavior**

Drawing with CPU or GPU gives the same result

**Actual Behavior**

Drawing with CPU and GPU gives different results when using larger blur radius

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.0
- Last known good version:  -
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Windows 10
- Target Devices: 
  - NVIDIA  RTX 2070  with driver 511.79
